Biography

I started my professional career by teaching English in Japanese public schools for four years. I am a current student of the full-time Immersive Engineering Bootcamp at Thinkful. Like many people, I came out of college with no idea what sort of career I wanted nor my motivation.

What draws me to programming is the creation aspect. Starting from nothing, planning out your project, layering on each component and then seeing your hard work congeal into a tangible object. As a tone-deaf creative individual that can't draw, this motivates me like nothing else.

When I'm not coding, I'm a freelance nerd. I enjoy RPG video games, tabletop RPGs, fantasy novels/comics, and long walks. If you don't know that RPG stands for, just realize that I'm a nerd.

Proficiencies

Exploits

YTDB

Like IMDb, but for Youtube Channels. Search for Youtube channels by Name, Keyword, and by Topic. View a channel's detailed analytics, ratings, and reviews. Save your favorite channels to your Dashboard and don't forget to leave your own ratings and reviews.

Live
Code

Jouzu

Memorize vocabulary words faster with Jouzu. Jouzu uses Spaced Repetition to help users quicken the learning process. Jouzu displays the correct and incorrect count for each word as well as thier total score (correct - incorrect).

Live
Code

Benrinote

Benrinote is publication hosting application with an integrated note-taking system. Users can select form a list of publication and add them to their dashboard. Users can read any publication from their dashboard and take notes along the way with an on-screen notes modal. Benrinote breaks publications down into sections and keeps track of the user's notes for each section.

Live
Code
